outputs.description: format is like: [{destination1: amount1}, {destination2: amount2}] or [{destination: *all*}]. It supports any number of **confirmed** outputs

feerate.description: used for the transaction as initial feerate. The default is *normal*

minconf.description: the minimum number of confirmations that used outputs should have. Default is 1

utxos.description: to be used to fund the transaction, as an array of `txid:vout`. These must be drawn from the node's available UTXO set
